nodes.text: Prenda Novallo was a female Human who lived during the Republic Dark Age. She worked as an engineer for the mercenary force Rusher's Brigade, aboard their starship—the Diligence—and in 1032 BBY, she accompanied the brigade to the planet Gazzari, where they had been hired to fight for the Sith Lord Daiman. In the aftermath of the battle, the Diligence fled to the planet Byllura and on arrival, Novallo exited the ship with her engineering crews, to check its hull integrity.
